org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia
Chamber of Craft and Small Business of Slovenia

org-entry.content-note: sustainable electricity generation (from nuclear, hydro and solar energy) and trade
50% owned by GEN energija Ljubljana, 50% owned by Hrvatska Elektropriveda Zagreb (Croatia)
production and distribution of electricity from nuclear power plant
66.3% owned by Petrol d.d. Ljubljana, 25% state-owned
manufactures exhaust systems for motorcycles, etc.
owned by K&H Czechia S.R.O. (Czech Republic) since 2022
ski boots, sports footwear and fashion shoes
part of European Helios Group since 2007
forging, pressing, stamping and roll-forming of metal
makers of electrotechnical products and technical ceramic products
manufacturers of heating equipment and domestic appliances
acquired by Hisense (People’s Republic of China) in 2018
electricity meters and energy management systems
acquired by Kansai Paints Co (Japan) in 2017
makers of resins and paints for the automotive industry, protective coatings for metal, wood and mineral surfaces, industrial adhesives
2 subsidiary cos: Konus S (Serbia) and Vulkan Protektor (Serbia)
mfr of leather goods, manmade fibres

address.verbatim-address: Cesta 19 Oktobra 57, POB 50, 1386 Stari trg pri Ložu

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Lek Pharmaceutical and Chemical Company d.d.

org-entry.content-note: pharmaceuticals, chemicals, cosmetics and medical products
sawmill operators, makers of wooden furniture, doors, etc.
major shareholder AnaCap Financial Partners (United Kingdom)
subsidiary of Mahle Holding Austria GmbH (Austria)
starter motors and generators for internal combustion engines, other automotive electrical parts, tools and specialist machinery
wholesale and general retail of technical consumer products, construction materials, installation and electrical fittings, industrial technical goods and ferrous metallurgy products
51% stake acquired by Mplus Gp (Croatia) in 2024
production and distribution of food products and wine
also operates petrol stations and hotels

org-entry.found-date: 2016 by merger of Pivovarna Laško and Pivovarna Union

org-entry.content-note: 62% owned by Slovenski Državni holding d.d.; 28% owned by Kapitalska Družba d.d.
